code: export var jsonToCsv=function jsonToCsv(json){if(json!==""){try{var parsedJson=JSON.parse(json);var obj={count:2,items:parsedJson};console.log("parsedJson",parsedJson);var header=Object.keys(obj.items[0]).join(",");console.log("header",header);var body=obj.items.map(function(j){return Object.values(j).join(",");}).join("n");console.log("body",body);return"".concat(header,"\n").concat(body);}catch(e){return;}}else{return;}};
